marklogic.body:
Can I just correct a few misconceptions? This is not the fault of Ministers. The panic buying started on Tuesday. Ministers started waffling on Wednesday.
Neither is it the fault of unions. They were Always well over ten days from a strike.
Francis Maude did not say to chuck petrol around your kitchen while the gas is Burning, although by the sound of what some people have been saying he's practically guilty of dousing someone in petrol and setting them alight.
Until everyone grows up and takes responsibility for their own actions, this sort of thing will continue.
